title: The NFL just wrapped a record-breaking season. Here’s why next year’s going to be even bigger
summary_full: In the days leading up to the Super Bowl, the NFL announced that Paris, Melbourne and Rio de Janeiro will host regular-season games for the first time.
summary_public: In the days leading up to the Super Bowl, the NFL announced that Paris, Melbourne and Rio de Janeiro will host regular-season games for the first time.

FR.label: neutral
